Html:
I found that AlgoUtility.IsolatedVertices returns vertices with neighbours. I've listed this as workitem 5365 in the issue tracker and a detailed description is given there. (I'm not sure if that is the way you want work-items to be handed out to you, but anyway)

Hopefully, this will help you improve your library further more,

Marijn
Thanks for reporting, I've fixed the bug.
